actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to allow the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to exempt certain depository institutions from certain legal requirements, and for other purposes.
short_title: Community Bank Sensible Regulation Act of 2017

summary.text:
Community Bank Sensible Regulation Act of 2017

This bill amends federal finance laws to allow federal financial regulatory agencies to exempt from their regulatory purview, based on consideration of specified factors, certain depository institutions with less than $10 billion in assets.

titles.title: Community Bank Sensible Regulation Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to allow the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to exempt certain depository institutions from certain legal requirements, and for other purposes.
Community Bank Sensible Regulation Act of 2017
